data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Ball safe as San Jose is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 2, Robert Sibiga signals a throw-in for San Jose, close to LA Galaxy's area.
Sebastian Lletget is on target to give LA Galaxy a 0-1 advantage.
In San Jose, San Jose push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 7, Can San Jose get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in LA Galaxy's half?
LA Galaxy awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Robert Sibiga signals a San Jose throw-in in LA Galaxy's half.
In the minute 9, Free kick LA Galaxy.
LA Galaxy awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in LA Galaxy.
In the minute 12, An attacking San Jose player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
Nick DePuy (LA Galaxy) gets a yellow card.
Chris Wondolowski (San Jose) places the ball on the penalty spot ... And fails to net!
In the minute 17, San Jose's Carlos Fierro misses with an attempt on goal.
Robert Sibiga awards LA Galaxy a goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 18, Throw-in for San Jose in the half of LA Galaxy.
San Jose to take a throw-in in LA Galaxy territory.
San Jose drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 20, LA Galaxy to take a throw-in in San Jose territory.
Robert Sibiga signals a LA Galaxy throw-in in San Jose's half.
LA Galaxy have been awarded a corner by Robert Sibiga.
In the minute 22, Goal kick for San Jose at Earthquakes Stadium.
Robert Sibiga awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for San Jose in their own half.
In the minute 24, Throw-in for LA Galaxy at Earthquakes Stadium.
Corner awarded to San Jose.
Chris Wondolowski (San Jose) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
In the minute 27, Throw-in LA Galaxy.
San Jose awarded a throw-in in their own half.
LA Galaxy are coming forward and Joe Corona gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 29, It's a goal kick for the home team in San Jose.
Free kick for LA Galaxy in their own half.
Robert Sibiga signals a free kick to San Jose in their own half.
In San Jose a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 31, Perry Kitchen (LA Galaxy) has received a first yellow card.
Florian Jungwirth's header is off-target for San Jose.
In the minute 33, LA Galaxy have a goal kick.
Robert Sibiga signals a free kick to San Jose.
Ball goes out of play for a LA Galaxy goal kick.
In the minute 35, Robert Sibiga awards the home team a throw-in.
Ball safe as San Jose is awarded a throw-in in their half.
San Jose awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 37, Throw-in for San Jose at Earthquakes Stadium.
At Earthquakes Stadium, San Jose are penalized for being offside.
Can San Jose get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in LA Galaxy's half?
In the minute 38, Free kick for San Jose in the half of LA Galaxy.
LA Galaxy's Cristian Pavon gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in San Jose.
In the minute 41, Throw-in for LA Galaxy in their own half.
Goal! Marcos Lopez levels the match at 1-1.
Great play from Nick Lima to set up the goal.
In the minute 44, Robert Sibiga awards the home team a throw-in.
LA Galaxy are pushing forward but Chicharito's finish is wide of the goal.
San Jose have a goal kick.
In the minute 45, In San Jose a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Free kick LA Galaxy.
In the minute 45, 3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Free kick for San Jose in the half of LA Galaxy.
In the minute 45, Cristian Espinoza for San Jose gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Robert Sibiga awards LA Galaxy a goal kick.
Ball safe as LA Galaxy is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 45, Robert Sibiga signals a free kick to San Jose.
The first half has been concluded at Earthquakes Stadium.
At Earthquakes Stadium, Carlos Fierro has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Jonathan Dos Santos (LA Galaxy) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Robert Sibiga has blown to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Throw-in for LA Galaxy in their own half.
Throw-in for LA Galaxy at Earthquakes Stadium.
Throw-in for San Jose in the half of LA Galaxy.
In the minute 49, San Jose awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Goal kick for San Jose at Earthquakes Stadium.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 51, Free kick for LA Galaxy in their own half.
Robert Sibiga signals a LA Galaxy throw-in in San Jose's half.
LA Galaxy have been awarded a corner by Robert Sibiga.
In the minute 53, LA Galaxy's Cristian Pavon misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a San Jose goal kick.
In San Jose San Jose drive forward through Cristian Espinoza. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 55, San Jose advance rapidly upfield but Robert Sibiga blows for offside.
Throw-in San Jose.
Free kick for San Jose in the half of LA Galaxy.
In the minute 58, Robert Sibiga signals a free kick to LA Galaxy in their own half.
Joe Corona (LA Galaxy) has received a yellow card from Robert Sibiga.
In the minute 63, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
San Jose's Jackson Yueill has been booked in San Jose.
Corner awarded to San Jose.
Tanner Beason (San Jose) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 65, Cristian Espinoza gets his shot on target but fails to score for San Jose.
Throw-in for LA Galaxy in the half of San Jose.
In the minute 66, Throw-in for LA Galaxy in their own half.
Efrain Alvarez is replacing Joe Corona for LA Galaxy at Earthquakes Stadium.
LA Galaxy to take a throw-in in San Jose territory.
Throw-in for LA Galaxy at Earthquakes Stadium.
In the minute 68, Robert Sibiga waits before resuming play because Judson for San Jose is still down.
Judson has recovered and rejoins the match in San Jose.
Can LA Galaxy get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in San Jose's half?
In the minute 71, Free kick LA Galaxy.
LA Galaxy have been awarded a corner by Robert Sibiga.
In the minute 72, LA Galaxy are whistled for offside.
Yony Gonzalez is on a sub for Sebastian Lletget for LA Galaxy.
Matias Jesus Almeyda (San Jose) has taken off Judson who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Luis Felipe is the replacement.
Matias Jesus Almeyda is making the team's second substitution at Earthquakes Stadium with Shea Salinas replacing Carlos Fierro.
In the minute 73, The home team have replaced Chris Wondolowski with Cade Cowell. This is the third substitution made today by Matias Jesus Almeyda.
LA Galaxy have a goal kick.
Corner awarded to San Jose.
In the minute 76, Shea Salinas of San Jose gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for LA Galaxy at Earthquakes Stadium.
San Jose awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 78, San Jose's Cristian Espinoza breaks free at Earthquakes Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a LA Galaxy goal kick.
In San Jose a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 81, San Jose have been awarded a penalty...
Goal! Andy Rios gives San Jose the lead from the penalty spot. The score is now 2-1.
Robert Sibiga signals a free kick to LA Galaxy.
In the minute 84, In San Jose a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Ball safe as LA Galaxy is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Robert Sibiga awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 88, Throw-in LA Galaxy.
The away team replace Jonathan Dos Santos with Ethan Zubak.
Guillermo Schelotto (LA Galaxy) is making a fourth substitution, with Sacha Kljestan replacing Chicharito.
San Jose awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick San Jose.
The fourth official's board shows 5 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick for LA Galaxy in the half of San Jose.
LA Galaxy have been awarded a corner by Robert Sibiga.
LA Galaxy are coming forward and Daniel Steres gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in San Jose.
Free kick for San Jose in their own half.
Robert Sibiga signals a free kick to LA Galaxy.
In San Jose LA Galaxy attack through Cristian Pavon. The finish is off target, however.
Robert Sibiga awards San Jose a goal kick.
The match is over. Final score 2-1.
Diedie Traore is replacing Emiliano Insua for the away team.
JT Marcinkowski is booked for the home team.
